summary: Adds a spell that lets you remove and equipped Power or Shout from your character completely.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a spell that removes powers and shouts from your character.

After the success of "Spell Eraser", a number of people have requested that I make a similar mod that removes powers and/or shouts. Wish granted. :) Power Eraser uses the exact same mechanic turned around - instead of a spell-erasing power you use a power-erasing spell.

Equip the Remove Power/Shout spell (found under Alteration) and the power or shout you want to remove, then just cast the spell and hey presto! The power or shout is gone. Note that you cannot remove passive powers, only those that you equip and cast.

[b]DISCLAIMER:[/b]
I will [i]not[/i] be held responsible for what you do with this mod. If you break a quest or mod by removing a quest-specific power or shout, be prepared to use the console to fix it yourself. Also note that in the case of mods, you may encounter a scenario where the removed power is just re-added the next time you load your game. I am powerless to prevent that.

Also available on Steam Workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=138866114]link
[/url]And on Bethesda.net: [url=https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/4015306]link[/url]
